statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT maintenance_date, mechanic_name FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE cost > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE inspection_passed = true;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost, inspection_passed FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, cost ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE inspection_passed = TRUE AND cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, mechanic_name, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type IN ('Tire Rotation', 'Brake Replacement') ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, inspector_name, inspection_results FROM vehicle_inspections WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_inspections WHERE inspection_results LIKE '%pass%' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records INNER JOIN vehicle_inspections ON vehicle_maintenance_records.vehicle_id = vehicle_inspections.vehicle_id WHERE vehicle_maintenance_records.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(id) AS maintenance_count FROM vehicle_maintenance_records GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, vehicle_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM VehicleInspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ComplianceAndSafety WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY compliance_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
SELECT * FROM VehicleInspections WHERE vehicle_id = 100 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, inspector_name FROM VehicleInspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT compliance_type FROM ComplianceAndSafety WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%oil%' AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM VehicleInspections WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM ComplianceAndSafety WHERE compliance_status = FALSE) ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, VIN FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, date, inspector_name, PASS FROM Inspections WHERE PASS = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE cost > 500.00 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, date, inspector_name FROM Inspections WHERE PASS = true ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, category, status FROM Compliance WHERE category='Safety' AND status='Compliant';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE Make='Toyota';
SELECT Model, Year FROM Vehicle WHERE Year > 2015;
SELECT MaintenanceDate, Make FROM Vehicle ORDER BY MaintenanceDate DESC;
SELECT ServiceType, ServiceCost FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE ServiceCost < 1000 ORDER BY ServiceCost ASC;
SELECT Name, Position FROM Employee WHERE Department='Maintenance' ORDER BY Name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle ORDER BY Year DESC, Make ASC, Model;
SELECT Make, Model, MaintenanceDate FROM Vehicle WHERE Year >= 2010;
SELECT InspectionID, InspectionDate, InspectorName FROM InspectionRecord WHERE PassOrFail = TRUE;

SELECT Vehicle.Make, MaintenanceRecord.ServiceType, MaintenanceEmployee.HoursWorked FROM Vehicle JOIN MaintenanceRecord ON Vehicle.VehicleID = MaintenanceRecord.VehicleID JOIN MaintenanceEmployee ON MaintenanceRecord.RecordID = MaintenanceEmployee.MaintenanceRecordID;
SELECT Employee.Name, Employee.Position, Employee.Department FROM Employee WHERE Employee.Position = 'Manager';
